attributes.action: Increase the Tax free amount of  redundancy payments to £50,000
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current limit of £30,000 has not been increased for years and people in completely ordinary jobs they have held for years easily breach it now.
Given the current state of the economy increasing the limit would provide a precisely targeted benefit to those who suffer the trauma and hardship of redundancy and reduce their reliance on state aid.
